title: UX Product Design Challenges for UAV Flight Controls w/ Dana Root

location.name: Crews Center for Entrepreneurship, 2nd Floor - University of Memphis

summary: Get UX mission-ready to launch UAV flight controls for multiple user types. Understand more about specific pilot and payload operator challenges in real-life defense-based scenarios. Dana Root will share unique user experience and product design challenges while redesigning legacy systems.

description.whoIsThisFor: This MeetUp is for Memphis' community of designers, developers, and anyone curious about the ever-changing world of technology. Whether you're a beginner trying to break into tech, a seasoned professional looking to sharpen your skills, or someone simply interested in how technology shapes our work and lives, this night is for you.

agenda.details: Grab some food, say hello, and connect with others in the room.

Get UX mission-ready to launch UAV flight controls for multiple user types. Understand more about specific pilot and payload operator challenges in real-life defense-based scenarios. Dana Root will share unique user experience and product design challenges while redesigning legacy systems.

We'll wrap up with conversation, connection, and appreciation for everyone who made the night possible. Expect shoutouts for upcoming events, a group photo, and space for feedback before we close out the evening.

speakers.name: Dana Root
speakers.talkTitle: UX Product Design Challenges for UAV Flight Controls

rsvp.details: Please confirm your attendance via the Meetup app so we can plan accordingly.

description.parkingInfo: There's ample free street parking available near the venue.
